kāmadevāḥ mṛtāḥ su alpaiḥ daśabhiḥ saptaka adhikaiḥ
te eva ekonaviṃśatyā yuktāḥ bahubhiḥ indriyaiḥ
dvis dhyāna jāḥ tu sarva alpaiḥ daśabhiḥ pañcaka adhikaiḥ
daśabhiḥ sa catuṣkaiḥ tu śubhakṛtsnāḥ samanvitāḥ
bṛhat phalāḥ hi ati alpaiḥ trayodaśabhiḥ anvitāḥ
yuktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ tu ete sarva bhūribhiḥ indriyaiḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ daśabhiḥ sa ekaiḥ ārūpyāḥ su alpa bhūribhiḥ
sa deva kauravāḥ sattvāḥ trayodaśabhiḥ anvitāḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ niḥśubhaḥ yuktaḥ daśabhiḥ vā traya adhikaiḥ
dvi liṅgāḥ paścimaiḥ su alpaiḥ viśati ā api ekayā param
sapta dravya avinirbhāgī paramāṇuḥ bahis gataḥ
kāmeṣu eka adhikaḥ kāye dvi adhikaḥ cakṣuḥ ādiṣu
evam rūpe vijñeyaḥ hitvā gandha rasa dvayam

original: cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ // Abhidh-d_111 //
analyzed: cittam caitasikaiḥ sārdham saṃskṛtam tu sva lakṣaṇaiḥ
daśa dharmāḥ mahābhaumāḥ vid saṃjñā cetanā smṛtiḥ
chandaḥ sparśaḥ dhi mokṣaḥ ca dhīḥ samādhiḥ manaskṛtiḥ
śraddhā apekṣā apramādaḥ ca prasrabdhiḥ hrīḥ apatrapā
mūlavīryam ahiṃsā ca śubhabhūkāḥ daśa smṛtāḥ
styānam pramattiḥ āśraddhyam ālasyam mūḍhiḥ uddhatiḥ

original: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā // Abhidh-d_114 //
analyzed: kliṣṭe ṣaṣ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyam anapatrapā
māyā śāṭhya mada krodha vihiṃsā īrṣyā pradaṣṭayaḥ
sūkṣma upanāha mātsaryāṇi alpa kleśa bhuvaḥ daśa
pṛthivī ādi yathā dravyam nīla ādi guṇa yogataḥ
taiḥ taiḥ viśeṣyate śabdaiḥ caitta yogāt manaḥ tathā
bhūta bhautika nānātvam svarūpa iha ākṛtam yathā
tathā eva citta caittānām pṛthaktvam upadhāryatām
yathā saṃbandhi saṃbandhāt vikāraḥ mbhasi lakṣyate
tathā saṃsargi saṃsargāt cetaḥ vikṛtiḥ īkṣyatām
guṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam dharmaḥ mātrā vṛttiḥ tathā āśrayī
iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ pradhāna apekṣa vṛttayaḥ
cittam pradhānam eteṣām vastu mātra graha ādibhiḥ
bījam ca etat pravṛttīnām śuddhi saṃkarayoḥ api
abhyudgacchati kāma āptam dharmaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ saha
akliṣṭa avyākṛtam cittam raśmivān iva raśmibhiḥ
tathā aṣṭādaśabhiḥ cittaiḥ nivṛtam jāyate manaḥ

original: dvāviṃśatyā sahāvaśyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavati mānasam // Abhidh-d_122 //
analyzed: dvāviṃśatyā saha avaśyam śubham bhavati mānasam
cetasoḥ saha viṃśatyā cittam utpadyate śubham
dṛś moha mātra yuktam yat krodha ādyaiḥ tu adhikam vadet
sarvatra saṃbhavāt middham yatra syāt tatra nirdiśet
tadvat eva ca kaukṛtyam adhikam gaṇayet kvacid
sa aśubham middha kaukṛtyam rūpadhātau na vidyate
dhyāna antare vitarkaḥ ca vicāraḥ ca api na upari
saṃprayuktaḥ saṃskāraḥ sama tā yasya pañcadhā

original: viprayuktaśca boddhavyaḥ samatā yasya nāstyasau // Abhidh-d_126 //
analyzed: viprayuktaḥ ca boddhavyaḥ sama tā yasya na asti asau
viśiṣṭānām asadbhāvāt prasaṃgaḥ nā asti rūpiṇām
saṃskāra grahaṇāt ca eva kha ādīnām na prasajyate
prāpti ādayaḥ tu saṃskārāḥ viprayuktāḥ trayodaśa
āpta ukti sva kriyā liṅgāḥ liṅgam eṣām gadiṣyate
rāptiḥ samanvitiḥ labdhiḥ dharmavat tā vyavasthitiḥ
śruta cintā mayānām ca samāpatti dvayasya ca
niḥkleśa saṃskṛta apūrvam śubhānām tu rajasvatām

original: ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate // Abhidh-d_131 //
analyzed: ādi lābhe saha prāk ca tad ūrdhvam vā tridhā iṣyate

original: kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
analyzed: kliṣṭāṇām kuśalānām ca tad anyeṣām tridhā matā
nivṛta avyākṛtāḥ jñāna nirmāṇa manasām tathā
nirvāṇasya āditas lābhe nityasya anyasya sarvadā

original: ajā tavartamānā ca kadācittu tridheṣyate // Abhidh-d_133 //
analyzed: ajā ta vartamānā ca kadācid tu tridhā iṣyate
eka artha ruci hetuḥ yaḥ sattvānām sa sabhāgatā
āsaṃjñikam vipākaḥ yat citta upacchedya saṃjñiṣu
śubha asaṃjñi samāpattiḥ dhyāne ntye citta rodhinī
niḥsṛti icchā pravṛtti tvāt na āryasya āpyā prayogataḥ
nirodha ākhyā tu vijñeyā vijihīrṣoḥ bhava agra jā
śubha āryasya prayogāpyā dvi vedyā niyatā matā
cetaḥ catuṣṭaya ayogāt āgamāt upapattitaḥ
nirvedita manaḥ bhāvāt siddhyati iyam acittikā
gati prajñapti upādānam āyuḥ citta ūṣmaṇoḥ sthitiḥ
āgama ādi uktitaḥ ca eva dravyataḥ tat sat iṣyate
jātiḥ sthitiḥ jarā nāśaḥ
catvāri sthiti nāstitve hetu tva ādi aprasiddhitaḥ
śakti hāneḥ jarā siddhiḥ na anya tvāt pariṇāmi tā
eka kāritra nāśābhyām śakti hāniḥ
sati janmani tad bhāvāt dravya kāritra nāśataḥ
āgamāt upapatteḥ ca vināśaḥ api sa hetukaḥ
vāc śabda adhīna janmānaḥ sva artha pratyāyana kriyāḥ
saṃjñā ādi apara nāmānaḥ trayaḥ nāma ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ
anye nāma ādayaḥ śabdāt aprāpta artha prakāśanāt
anityāḥ te tu vijñeyāḥ sa apekṣā artha vibhāvanāt
svarūpam vedayan śabdaḥ vyañjana ādīni ca dhruvam
artha pratyāyakaḥ
paramāṇu svabhāva tvāt ghoṣa eka tvam na yujyate
tādātmyam pratighāti tvāt tad siddhiḥ varaṇa ādibhiḥ
sphoṭa ākhyaḥ nā aparaḥ ghoṣāt śabdaḥ nityaḥ prasiddhi ati
krama vṛtteḥ na śabdena kaścid arthaḥ bhidhīyate

original: na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
analyzed: na śrutyā śrūyate śabdaḥ tad anyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ
yaḥ brūyāt sa svam ātmānam vidvadbhiḥ apahāsayet
pratidyotyam yathāyogam niyata a niyatāḥ ca te

original: niyatodbhāvanād buddhaḥ sarvajña iti gamyate // Abhidh-d_148 //
analyzed: niyata udbhāvanāt buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti gamyate
sattva ākhyāḥ kāmarūpa āptāḥ nisyanda avyākṛtāḥ tathā

original: tathaiva ca vipākaśca sābhāgyaṃ prāptayo dvidhā // Abhidh-d_149 //
analyzed: tathā eva ca vipākaḥ ca sābhāgyam prāptayaḥ dvidhā
sattva ākhya upadrava abhāvāt na caturthe sti sūtrataḥ
vimānasya sama tvasya pradhvaṃsāt nitya tā kutas
sapta tejobhiḥ eka adbhiḥ gate dbhiḥ saptake punar
tejasā sapta kāntyā ekā vāyu saṃvartanī tatas
āgneyāt saptakāt ekaḥ
āyuṣparigrahāt evam śubhakṛtsna āyuḥ edhanam
vāta ādi doṣa sādharmyāt sattvānām tad vināśakāḥ
ādhyātmikā iti sārūpyāt na bhū saṃvartanī matā
sattva upapatti hetūnām vipad saṃpad vidhāyinām
karma hetuḥ iti iṣyate

original: kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
analyzed: kāyikam vāc mayam ca eva cetanā ākhyam ca mānasam
karmāṇi etāni lokasya kāraṇam na īśvara ādayaḥ
vaiśvarūpyāt krama utpādāt tadvat anyat prasaṅgataḥ
na anya apekṣā pakṣa hāni ādi doṣataḥ
karmaṇām bodhyate śaktiḥ vidhi kāla graha ādibhiḥ

original: yato 'tasteṣu tācchabdyaṃ gauṇyā vṛttyā prayujyate // Abhidh-d_157 //
analyzed: yatas taḥ teṣu tācchabdyam gauṇyā vṛttyā prayujyate

original: pūrve vijñaptyavijñaptī cetanā mānasī kriyā // Abhidh-d_158 //
analyzed: pūrve vijñapti avijñaptī cetanā mānasī kriyā
annam atyagni nirdagdham yathā sthālī ca saṃskṛtā
pāpa dṛṣṭeḥ tathā śīlam śāṭhya īrṣyā ādi kṣata ātmanaḥ
saṃvṛt sat dṛṣṭi upetā atas bhikṣu tvam paramārthataḥ

original: ekasampattu saṃvṛtyā dvayābhāve dvidhāpi na // Abhidh-d_160 //
analyzed: eka sampad tu saṃvṛtyā dvaya abhāve dvidhā api na
vigata avaṇe jñāne buddha ukteḥ mukhya kalpanā

original: tadāśraye phale cāpi vijñeyā guṇakalpanā // Abhidh-d_161 //
analyzed: tad āśraye phale ca api vijñeyā guṇa kalpanā
śāśvata tva śubha tvābhyām sarva anartha nivṛttitaḥ
mukhya kalpanayā tadvat dharmaḥ nirvāṇam ucyate
āryāḥ śiṣya guṇāḥ saṃghaḥ tathā eva paramārthataḥ

original: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam // Abhidh-d_163 //
analyzed: etān yaḥ yāti śaraṇam sa yāti śaraṇa trayam
mithyā ācāraḥ satām garhyāt paratra akaraṇa āptitaḥ
pāpiṣṭha tvāt mṛṣāvādaḥ madya pānam smṛti kṣayātū
sarvebhyaḥ vartamānebhyaḥ dvividhebhyaḥ kāma jaḥ
tri kālebhyaḥ tu maulebhyaḥ labhyete bhāvanā mayau
sarvebhyaḥ sattva jātibhyaḥ saṃvaraḥ vā aṅga kāraṇaiḥ

original: sarvebhyo saṃvarāṅgebhyaḥ sattvebhyaśca na kāraṇaiḥ // Abhidh-d_166 //
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ saṃvara aṅgebhyaḥ sattvebhyaḥ ca na kāraṇaiḥ
kriyayā a saṃvara praptiḥ sa ha abhyupagamena vā
avijñaptiḥ atas nyasyāḥ kṣetra aṅga ādi viśeṣataḥ
kāma āpta saṃvara tyāgaḥ śikṣā nikṣepaṇa ādibhiḥ
tat na iti anye tu ayogataḥ
ayogaḥ na aṃśu vidhvaṃsāt paṭa dravyam vinaśyati
sūtre dhvaṃsa uktiḥ anya arthā yathā īrṣyā śaṭhana ādiṣu
saddharma antarddhitaḥ nye nye na apūrva apratilambhataḥ

original: bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham // Abhidh-d_170 //
analyzed: bhū saṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyāna jam śubham
phala āpti akṣa vihānibhiḥ
asaṃvaraḥ dama prāptiḥ jīvita utsarjanā ā dibhiḥ
citta vega ādi vicchedaiḥ avijñaptiḥ tu madhyamā
kāmāptam kuśalam nāma tribhiḥ mūlacchid ādibhiḥ
pratipakṣa udayāt kliṣṭam tridhātu āptam vihīyate

original: sarve kāmeṣu rūpe dvāveko 'rūpiṣu lābhataḥ // Abhidh-d_173 //
analyzed: sarve kāmeṣu rūpe dvau ekaḥ rūpiṣu lābhataḥ
yat iṣṭa phala dam karma kuśalam tat udāhṛtam
viparyayeṇa akuśalam avyākṛtam atas nyathā
kāma āptam prathamam puṇyam apuṇyam aśubha ātmakam
ūrdhvabhūmikam ānejyam vipākam pratyanejanāt
sukha vedyam śubham karma dhyānāt arvāk turīyakāt
upekṣā vedyam anyatra duḥkha vedyan tu pāpakam
madhyamam karma dhyānena antye pi nirvṛteḥ
yugapad tri vipāka iṣṭeḥ dhyāna antara vipākataḥ
punar caturvidham karma dṛṣṭa vedya ādi bhedataḥ
janmanaḥ tribhiḥ ākṣepaḥ dṛṣṭa dharma āhvayāt ṛte
caturṇām api ca ākṣepaḥ sarvatra narakāt ṛte
na tatra iṣṭa phala abhāvāt śubham yasmāt vipacyate
na utpadya vedya kṛt tatra yat viraktaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
sthiraḥ bhava mūlayoḥ
yadā ārtra raudra cittena karma abhīkṣṇam niṣevyate

original: satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate // Abhidh-d_181 //
analyzed: sat kṣetre kriyate yat ca phalam tasya niyamyate
kṣetra āśaya viśeṣāt ca phalam sadyas vipacyate
nirodha vyutthita ādau ca sadyas kāla phala kriyā
tad bhūmi apunarutpatteḥ vipāka niyatam ca yat

original: tacca dṛṣṭaphalaṃ vidyāt karmādaḥ paripūrakam // Abhidh-d_183 //
analyzed: tat ca dṛṣṭa phalam vidyāt karma adaḥ paripūrakam
kuśalasya avicārasya caitasikī eva vedanā

original: vipākaḥ kāyikī tviṣṭā duḥkhavedyasya karmaṇaḥ // Abhidh-d_184 //
analyzed: vipākaḥ kāyikī tu iṣṭā duḥkha vedyasya karmaṇaḥ
sa pākam aśubham kṛṣṇam sa pākam rūpa jam sitam

original: śubhāśubhaṃ dvidhā kāme nirmalaṃ tatprahāṇakṛt // Abhidh-d_185 //
analyzed: śubha aśubham dvidhā kāme nirmalam tad prahāṇa kṛt
ca sasraḥ dṛkpathāḥ dṛṣṭau cetanā bhāvanā pathāt
ānantarya pathāḥ kāme karma etat kṛṣṇa nāśa kṛt

original: navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayāghātinī /
analyzed: navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇa akṛṣṇayā āghātinī

original: antānantaryamārgasthā dhyāne dhyāne sitasya tu // Abhidh-d_187 //
analyzed: anta ānantarya mārga sthāḥ dhyāne dhyāne sitasya tu
kāya ādi akuśalam karma sarvam duścaritam matam
abhidhyā ādīni api trīṇi manaḥ duścarita trayam
śubham tat sa anabhidhyā ādi proktam su carita trayam

original: dvayaṃmaulamadaḥ karma mārgā daśa śubhāśubhāḥ // Abhidh-d_189 //
analyzed: dvayam maula madaḥ karma mārgāḥ daśa śubha aśubhāḥ
kāritāḥ ṣaṣ avijñaptiḥ dvi ātmā ekaḥ te pi ṣaṭ kṛtāḥ

original: śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekadhaite samāhitāḥ // Abhidh-d_190 //
analyzed: śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyāḥ ekadhā ete samāhitāḥ
yā sāmanteṣu avijñaptiḥ pṛṣṭheṣu tu viparyayaḥ
prayogaḥ tu tri mūla utthaḥ abhidhyā ādyāḥ tri mūla jāḥ
kuśalāḥ prayoga pṛṣṭhāḥ ca kuśala traya mūla jāḥ
dveṣeṇa vadha pāruṣya vyāpattīnām samāpanam
steyasya anya aṅganā āyāteḥ abhidhyāyāḥ ca lobhataḥ
mithyādṛśaḥ tu mohena tad anyeṣām tribhiḥ matam
caturṇām api adhiṣṭhānam jñeyam eṣām yathākramam

original: prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // Abhidh-d_194 //
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ ca atha bhogāḥ ca nāma rūpam ca nāma ca
prāṇa atipātaḥ dhī pūrvam abhrāntyā para māraṇam
a tyakta anya dhana ādānam adatta ādānam ucyate
para strī gamanam kāma mithyā ācāraḥ vikalpavān
artha jñāya anyathāvādaḥ droha buddhyā mṛṣāvacaḥ
dṛṣṭayā śruti ādibhiḥ ca akṣaiḥ manasā yat ca gṛhyate

original: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ jñātamityuktaṃ tadyathākramam // Abhidh-d_197 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam śrutam matam jñātam iti uktam tat yathākramam
paiśunyam bheda kṛt vākyam pāruṣyam tu yat apriyam
kliṣṭam saṃbhinna lāpi tvam anye gīta kathā ādi vat
para sva asat spṛhā abhidhyā vyāpādaḥ sattva gocaraḥ
vidveṣa an ananta dṛṣṭiḥ tu mithyādṛṣṭiḥ ahetukā
cetanā na kriyā mārgaḥ taiḥ tu sattā pravartate
yugapad yāvat aṣṭābhiḥ aśubhaiḥ cetanaiḥ saha
śubhaiḥ tu daśabhiḥ yāvat sārdham na eka aṣṭa pañcabhiḥ
vilāpa dveṣa pāruṣyāṇi uṣanti narake dvidhā
tadvat eva mata abhidhyā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ca
abhidhyā ādi trayam tadvat kurau pralapanam dvidhā
aśubhāḥ tu daśa anyatra sarvatra kuśalāḥ trayaḥ

original: ārūpyāryāsaṃjñināṃ ca rūpiṇaḥ sapta lābhataḥ // Abhidh-d_203 //
analyzed: ārūpya ārya asaṃjñinām ca rūpiṇaḥ sapta lābhataḥ
kurūn sa narakān hitvā sarvatra anyatra te dvidhā
sarve vipāka nisyanda ādhipatya phala dāḥ daśa
duḥkha upasaṃhṛteḥ duḥkham alpa āyuḥ tvam tu māraṇāt
tejaḥ nāśāt kṛśa ojaḥ tvam idam tat trividham phalam
ānantarya pathe karma phalavat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ
caturbhiḥ tu amalena āryam tadvat anyat śabhāśubham
tatas jñeyam tribhiḥ avyākṛtam tathā

original: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ // Abhidh-d_207 //
analyzed: phalam śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubha ādayaḥ

original: śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
analyzed: śubha ādyāḥ tu aśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt

original: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ // Abhidh-d_208 //
analyzed: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubha ādayaḥ
sarve catvāri atītasya madhyamasya ca bhāvinaḥ
madhyamā dve svakasya eva trīṇi anāgāmi janmanaḥ
catvāri eka bhuvaḥ dve vā trīṇi ca apara bhūmikāḥ
śaikṣa ādyāḥ trīṇi śaikṣasya te eva aśaikṣa karmaṇaḥ

original: ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
analyzed: ekam trīṇi dvayam ca eva śaikṣa ādyāḥ paścimasya tu

original: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ // Abhidh-d_211 //
analyzed: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyam dṛś heyasya tu karmaṇaḥ

original: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: trīṇi catvāri ca ekam ca dṛṣṭi heya ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ // Abhidh-d_212 //
analyzed: te tu abhyāsa praheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ
kramāt eka dvi catvāri te tu aheyasya karmaṇaḥ
ekena ākṣipyate janma bhūribhiḥ paripūryate
kuśalam vā athavā pāpam yat atītam dadat phalam

original: svaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sā karmasvakatā matā // Abhidh-d_214 //
analyzed: svam kāya vāc manaḥ karma sā karma svaka tā matā
saṃvṛtyā skandha santāne tad kriyā phala darśanāt

original: kartṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu // Abhidh-d_215 //
analyzed: kartṛ tā bhoktṛ tā ca uktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu
syāt karma svaka tā na asti tasya ca iti catuṣkikā
prathamā tad phala sthasya vihānāt tasya karmaṇaḥ
dvitīyā tad phala sthasya karmaṇā tena ca anvayāt
tṛtīyā ubhaya yuktasya caturthī anubhayasya tu
syāt karma svaka tā nā api tad phalam vedayiṣyati
tad phala avasthitasya ādyā jñeyā tad carame phale
dvitīyā dhruva pākasya tad vipāka anavasthite

original: tṛtīyā dvayasadbhāvā caturthī tūbhayaṃ vinā // Abhidh-d_219 //
analyzed: tṛtīyā dvaya sadbhāvā caturthī tu ubhayam vinā
syāt karmaṇā anvitaḥ ca eva no ca tad phala vedanam
ādyāḥ datta vipākena niruddha anāgata ādinā
dvitīyā tu vihīnena dhruva pākena karmaṇā

original: tṛtīyā dvayamuktasya caturthī tu dvayādṛte // Abhidh-d_221 //
analyzed: tṛtīyā dvaya muktasya caturthī tu dvayāt ṛte
ayukta vihitam karma kleśa upakleśa dūṣitam
śikṣā liṅga ādi apetam ca kecid āhuḥ vipaścitaḥ
bodhisattvaḥ kutas yāvat a vivartya manāḥ yatas
badhnāti bodhi sannāham aṅgīkṛtvā jagat hitam
yadā lākṣaṇikam karma prakaroti anapāya gaḥ
mahā kulaḥ samagra akṣaḥ sva parṣad saṃgrahe rataḥ
pumān jātismaraḥ vāgmī prajñā vīrya kriyā anvitaḥ
tadā deva manuṣyāṇām abhivyaktim nigacchati
sa hi tribhiḥ asaṃkhyeyaiḥ dharmakāya guṇa arṇavam

original: pracinoti tadādhāraṃ kāyaṃ kalpaśatena tu // Abhidh-d_226 //
analyzed: pracinoti tad ādhāram kāyam kalpa śatena tu
dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇa upetam aśīti vyañja na ujjvalam

original: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati // Abhidh-d_227 //
analyzed: dviṣatām api yam dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyas prasīdati
yugānta vāyunā meruḥ vahninā varuṇālayaḥ

original: vajreṇa dhvasyate vajramavikāri tu tanmanaḥ // Abhidh-d_228 //
analyzed: vajreṇa dhvasyate vajram avikāri tu tat manaḥ
kāma āptam ṣaṣṭha jam tredhā kṛpā śraddhā paramparam

original: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute // Abhidh-d_229 //
analyzed: buddha utpāde naraḥ strī vā tad ādyam cittam aśnute
sarvebhyaḥ sarvadā sarvam vadataḥ dāna pūraṇam
maraṇe dama atyāgaḥ śīlasya utkṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
vīryasya tiṣya saṃstutyā dhiyaḥ vajra upamāt param
sarvāsām tu kṣaya jñāne paripūriḥ vidhīyate
tri puṇya kṛti vastu ādyāḥ tad lābha upāya deśanāḥ
tathā catur adhiṣṭhānam sapta saddharma śāsanam
sapta yogāḥ trayaḥ skandhāḥ tri śikṣā ādyāḥ ca deśitāḥ
tathā pāramitāḥ ca api catasraḥ vinaya uditāḥ
bodhi pakṣyāḥ ca kaṇṭha uktāḥ saptatriṃśat svayaṃbhuvā
hetavaḥ sarva bodhinām trividhāḥ mṛdu tā ādibhiḥ
tasmāt na bodhi mārgaḥ nyaḥ sūtra ādi piṭaka trayāt
atas yaḥ brūyāt sa bhavet māra bhāṣitaḥ
kalpānām mahatām etat asaṃkhyeya trayam matam
sthāna antaram asaṃkhya ākhyam adaḥ saṃkhyā upari sthitam
apakarṣe jina utpattiḥ yāvat śata sama āyuṣaḥ
dvayoḥ pratyekabuddhānām utkarṣe cakravartinām
na adho śīti sahasra āyoḥ tad samutpattiḥ iṣyate
te hema rūpya tāmra ayaḥ cakrāḥ puṇya prabhāvataḥ
tulye sādhana upāye kṣā ādi bhedataḥ
bhava mokṣa arthinoḥ mātroḥ pradāna phala bheda vat
karuṇā bhāvanā udrekāt sva saṃvid cittayoḥ tathā
para saṃvid guroḥ tadvat tad viśeṣaḥ vidhīyate
hetu tattva phala udbhūtam mahattvam śāsituḥ tridhā
vimuktau api tulyāyām trayāṇām bodhi lambhanāt
buddhasya saṃmukhīnasya bauddham ākṣipyate vapuḥ
sa eka puṇya śata udbhūtam ekaikam lakṣaṇam muneḥ
yathā karma pathāḥ tadvat puṇya ādi trayam iṣyate

original: dānaṃ hi dīyate yena svaparārthādyapekṣayā // Abhidh-d_243 //
analyzed: dānam hi dīyate yena sva para artha ādi apekṣayā
kāya ādi karma tat tattvam avijñaptiḥ kvacid punar

original: prādhānyānmuninā proktaṃ mahābhogaphalaṃ hi tat // Abhidh-d_244 //
analyzed: prādhānyāt muninā proktam mahā bhoga phalam hi tat
sva anya ubhaya artha siddhi artham dānam dadati kecana
sādhu vṛtti anuvṛti artham na ubhaya arthāya ca apare
dātṛ vastu ādi vaiśiṣṭyāt tad phala atiśayaḥ smṛtaḥ
śraddhā ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ dātā datte satkriyā ādibhiḥ
satkāra ādi guṇa upetam phalam tasmāt avāpnute
vastu varṇa ādi saṃpannam saurūpya ādi phala pradam
guṇa duḥkha upakāra ākhyaḥ dharmaiḥ kṣetram viśiṣyate
āśaya ādi mṛdu tva ādeḥ mṛdu tva ādīni karmaṇaḥ
dharma dātre pi bālāya pitre mātre tha rogiṇe
ameyam bodhisattvāya dānam anya bhavāya ca
bodhisattvasya yat dānam anyasya api yat aṣṭamam
vipaścidbhiḥ tat ākhyātam śreṣṭham yat ca arhataḥ rhate
saṃpradhārya yat ākṣiptam pūraṇa ādi dṛḍhīkṛtam
vigata pratipakṣam ca tat karma upacitam matam
svasmāt tyāga guṇa apekṣāḥ caittāḥ caityārcatā ādiṣu
vinā pratigṛhītrā api phalam maitrī vihāra vat
avyākṛta svabhāva tvāt na nāma ādi anna dāna vat
śīlam śubha mayam rūpam vyākhyātam tad prabhedataḥ
śāstre tu tad pradhāna tvāt proktam svarga upapattaye
dauḥśīlya aśubha mūla ādyaiḥ doṣaiḥ yat na vidūṣitam
tad vipakṣa śama aṅgam ca yat tat chadvam iha ucyate
puṇyam samāhitam tu atra bhāvanā citta bhāvanāt
pradhānyāt apavargāya tat uktam sarvadarśinā
puṇya nirvāṇa bhāgīyam nirvedha anuguṇam tathā
śāsane smin samāsena śubha mūlam tridhā iṣyate
saṃkhyā khalu api vijñeyā manaḥ karma svabhāvikā
akārya pravaṇaḥ lokaḥ duḥkha bhāgī ca yad vaśāt
rāga ādīn bhava saṃbandhān kleśān vakṣyāmi tān aham
sva śakti ja kriyā udbhūtaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ te tu nāmabhiḥ
ātta sāmānya saṃjñākāḥ codyante nu śaya ādibhiḥ
rāga pratigha saṃmoha māna kāṅkṣā kudṛṣṭayaḥ
ṣaṭ ete nuśayāḥ proktāḥ śreyaḥ dvāra vibandhinaḥ
rāga dvedhāt matāḥ sapta dṛṣṭi bhedāt daśa smṛtāḥ
bhūyas ṣṭānavatiḥ jñeyā dhātu ākāra ādi bhedataḥ
kāma rāgaḥ bhava ākhyaḥ ca dvidhāḥ rāgaḥ prabhidyate
prāyas bahiṣpravṛtta tvāt antarvatti ādi bhedataḥ
sat kāya anta dvaya grāhau mithyā darśanam eva ca
dṛṣṭi śīla vrata āmarśau iti etāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ
daśā iha duḥkha dṛś heyāḥ sapta hetu īkṣaṇa kṣayāḥ
sapta apavarga dṛś heyāḥ aṣṭau mārga īkṣaṇa kṣayāḥ
dṛṣṭi heya avalambi tvāt sat ākāra parigrahāt
rāga ādayaḥ tu catvāraḥ jñeyāḥ mārga dvaya kṣayāḥ
pratikalpa vaśa utpatteḥ dṛṣṭi kāṅkṣe tu dṛkkṣaye
rūpe ipi evam tathā ārūpye pratigha anuśayāt ṛte

original: bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
analyzed: bhava agre kṣānti heyāḥ ye dṛś heyāḥ eva te matāḥ
jñāna vadhyāḥ tu ye tasmin abhyāsena eva tad kṣayaḥ

original: ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
analyzed: aham mama iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ asau sat kāya dṛś smṛtā
tad uccheda dhruva grāhau yau sā antar grāha dṛś matā
phala hetu apavādaḥ yaḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
jñeyaḥ dṛṣṭi parāmarśaḥ hīna vastu uttama grahaḥ
ahetau apathe ca eva tat hi śīla vrata āhvayaḥ
duḥkha bhrānti apatha ādānāt tad dṛṣṭi utsāryaḥ eva saḥ
sat kāya dṛṣṭi avacchedaḥ dharma mātra īkṣaṇa ādi atas
duḥkha abhisamaye tat ca tad dṛś heyā eva saḥ u pi atas
dvayam dṛṣṭi parāmarśāt ekaḥ sat kāya dṛṣṭitaḥ
antar grāha ardham anyaḥ tu viparyāsaḥ prakalpyate
nitīraṇa samāropa viparīta pravṛttitaḥ
viparyāsa uktiḥ eṣu eva dṛś vaśāt citta saṃjñayoḥ
sapta māna vidhāḥ tribhyaḥ nava māna vidhāḥ tridhā
tridhā ati unnamana ādibhyaḥ sva utkarṣa ādi asti nāstitā
vadha ādi paryavasthānam kaukṛtyam aśubham vidhāḥ

original: vibhavecchā ca nāryasya jāyante hetvabhāvataḥ // Abhidh-d_276 //
analyzed: vibhava icchā ca nārī asya jāyante hetu abhāvataḥ

kāṅkṣā pañca dṛśaḥ vidyā tad vyāmiśrā atha kevalāḥ
sapta sarvatragāḥ duḥkhāt henoḥ ebhyaḥ catuṣṭayam

original: dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
analyzed: dravyataḥ daśa ca ekaḥ ca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ
rāga pratigha mānāḥ tu pariccheda pravartinaḥ
prakāra antara varti tvāt sakṛt sarva sva bhū gatiḥ
dhātu antara avalambi tvāt pūrva uktāḥ eva sarva gāḥ
nava ūrdhvadhātukāḥ teṣām ādyāḥ dṛṣṭi dvayāt ṛte

original: teṣāṃ sahabhuvo dharmāḥ prāptivarjyāśca sarvagāḥ // Abhidh-d_281 //
analyzed: teṣām saha bhuvaḥ dharmāḥ prāpti varjyāḥ ca sarva gāḥ
kāṅkṣā mithyā dṛgābhyām ca miśrā avidyā atha kevalā
nirodha mārga dṛś heyāḥ ṣaṭ ete nirmala īkṣiṇaḥ

tad dṛśya viṣayaḥ nyaḥ nyaḥ hetu tvāt hetu bhāvataḥ
na rāgaḥ śakti ahetu tvāt na dveṣaḥ na aparādhataḥ
ti praśānta tvāt na bhāva tvāt parāḥ
sarvagaḥ nuśayaḥ kṛtsnām anuśete sva dhātu gaḥ
svām ālambanataḥ bhūmim sva nikāyam tu asarvagaḥ
asvīkārāt vipakṣa tvāt na ūrdhva bhū mārga gocaraḥ
saṃprayogiṇi tu svasmin ahīne saṃprayogataḥ
ete nuśerate yasmāt tasmāt anuśayāḥ smṛtāḥ
svaiḥ iṣṭa ādibhiḥ ākāraiḥ paramāṇu kṣaṇeṣu api
yatas nuśerate ca ete tatas ca anuśayāḥ matāḥ
ādyam dṛṣṭi dvayam kāme nivṛta avyākṛtam matam

original: dhātudvaye tu sarve 'pi nivṛtāvyākṛtā malāḥ // Abhidh-d_289 //
analyzed: dhātu dvaye tu sarve nivṛta avyākṛtāḥ malāḥ

original: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ // Abhidh-d_291 //
analyzed: avidyā dhīḥ ca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣā māna dṛṣṭayaḥ
cala tvāt ūrdhva vṛtti tvāt avyāpi tvāt yathākramam
sūtrasya artha aparijñānāt ahetuḥ dhyāyi codanāt
praśna vyākaraṇāni ākhyat catvāri vadatām varaḥ

original: śiṣyāṇāṃ vādaśikṣārthaṃ sthitīnāṃ ca catuṣṭayīm // Abhidh-d_293 //
analyzed: śiṣyāṇām vāda śikṣā artham sthitīnām ca catuṣṭayīm
eka aṃśa ākhyam vibhajya ākhyam pṛccha ākhyam sthāpyam eva ca
sthānavādi tva saṃjñā ekā parikalpa āhvayā parā
anyā pratipad ākhyā anyā jñāna vādi tva saṃjñitā
māna pratigha saṃrāgaiḥ vartamānaḥ jjhita kriyaiḥ
jātāḥ yatra aprahīṇāḥ ca saṃyuktaḥ tatra vastuni
ajātaiḥ mānasaiḥ etaiḥ sarvatra anyaiḥ svaka ādhvikaiḥ

dvayam eva atra niṣpannam tṛtīyam tu upacārataḥ
sat asat hetutā yasmāt madhyasthaiḥ ca parigrahāt
sarvam asti pradeśaḥ sti sarvam na asti iti ca aparaḥ
avyākṛta astivādī iti catvāraḥ vādinaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmasau /
analyzed: ebhyaḥ yaḥ prathamaḥ vādī bhajate sādhu tām asau
tarka abhimāninaḥ tu anye yukti āgama bahiṣkṛtāḥ
icchati adhva trayam yasmāt kṛtyataḥ ca dhruva trayam
sarvāstivādaḥ iti uktaḥ tasmāt ādyaḥ caturvidhaḥ
bhāva aṅka anyathika ākhyau paraḥ
anyathā anyathikaḥ ca anyaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ yuktivādyataḥ
kāritreṇa adhvanām epa vyavasthām abhivāñchati
tat kurvan vartamānaḥ dhvā kṛte kṛte paraḥ
buddhyā yasya īkṣyate cihnam tat saṃjñā iyam caturvidham
paramārthena saṃvṛtyā dvayena apekṣayā api ca
sat atīta asamutpannam buddha ukteḥ vartamāna vat
dhīnām agocara tvat ca tat sattvam vartamāna vat
na asat ālambanā buddhiḥ āgamāt upapattitaḥ
anya apekṣye tha saṃbandha prtiṣedhaḥ śva śṛṅgayoḥ

sā jñānasya āsana ākārā śāstuḥ tathā anya citta vat
harṣa utpāda bhaya udvega smṛti utpatti aṅga bhāvataḥ
sa aṅgasya śakti abhivyakteḥ sa dīpa ghaṭa rūpa vat
janī hā kartṛ sādhya tvāt pañca bhāva vikāra vat
sataḥ kriyā aṅga tā dṛṣṭeḥ vikārya prāpya karma vat
dvitīyam janma jātasya vastunaḥ na upapadyate

original: mukhyasattā guṇābhāvādgauṇī sattā na vidyate // Abhidh-d_310 //
analyzed: mukhya sattā guṇa abhāvāt gauṇī sattā na vidyate

āviṣṭa liṅga mukhyasya janma iṣṭam dāraka ādi vat

original: svabhāvo yadi bhāvanāṃ prāgabhūtvā samudbhavet // Abhidh-d_312 //
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ yadi bhāvanām prāk a bhūtvā samudbhavet

original: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām // Abhidh-d_313 //
analyzed: vada somya katham yāti pratītyā vastu vastu tām
loke dṛṣṭaḥ satoḥ eva parasparam anugrahaḥ

yat pratītyasamutpannam tad svabhāvāt na vidyate
na vidyate svabhāvāt yat vidyate tat tatas nyathā
prakurvanti daśā mātram hetavaḥ vastunaḥ sataḥ
rāja tvam rāja putrasya sātmakasya eva mantriṇaḥ
dharmāṇām sati sāmagrye sāmarthyam upajāyate
citānām paramāṇūnām yadvat ātma upalambhane
karma atītam asat yasya phalam bhāvi karoti asat
vyaktam vandhyā sutaḥ tasya jāyate vyantara ātmajāt
nāma sat lakṣaṇa abhāvāt dravya satya aṅka siddhitaḥ
anāgata abhyatītasya na asti prajñapti satya tā

original: ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
analyzed: kaḥ vighnaḥ aṅga vaikalyam na tad sarva astitā sadā

original: tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā // Abhidh-d_320 //
analyzed: tat katham śrūyatām sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā

labdha śakteḥ phala ākṣepaḥ kāritram abhidhīyate
na vartamāna tā rūpam atīta ajāta tā na ca
na adhva saṃcārāt rūpa ātma anyathatā iṣyate
avasthā jāyate kācid vidyamānasya vastunaḥ

original: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā // Abhidh-d_323 //
analyzed: tathā śaktiḥ tathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā
parikalpaiḥ jagat vyāptam mūrkha citta anurañjibhiḥ

original: yastu vidvanmanogrāhī parikalpaḥ sa durlabhaḥ // Abhidh-d_324 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu vidvat manaḥ grāhī parikalpaḥ sa durlabhaḥ
anya sarvatragaiḥ baddhaḥ prahīṇe duḥkha dṛś kṣaye
prahīṇe prāc prakāre śeṣaiḥ tad avalambibhiḥ
dharmāḥ ṣoḍaśa vijñeyāḥ pratyekam tri bhava ātmakāḥ

original: pañcadhā nirmalāścaiva vijñānāni tathaiva ca // Abhidh-d_326 //
analyzed: pañcadhā nirmalāḥ ca eva vijñānāni tathā eva ca
dhātu āyatana satyeṣu prakāreṣu ca lakṣayet
sa duḥkha hetu dṛś heyāḥ kāma āptāḥ bhāvanā kṣayāḥ
svaka traya eka rūpa āpti virajāḥ citta gocarāḥ

kāma āptam pañca viṣayaḥ rūpa āptam tu aṣṭa gocaraḥ

original: ārupyāptaṃ daśānāṃ tu daśānāmeva cāmalam // Abhidh-d_331 //
analyzed: ārupya āptam daśānām tu daśānām eva ca amalam

original: catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /

original: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ // Abhidh-d_336 //
analyzed: rūpa āpte prathame trayaḥ sve khalu api trayaḥ
ārūpyāḥ sarvagāḥ sārdham bhāvanāpatha saṃkṣayaiḥ

tṛtīye khalu api sve ca sa āsrava artha avalambinaḥ
parāvṛtte sva dhātu āptāḥ saṃskṛta artha avalambinaḥ
anyat tu ādyavat ākhyeyam caturthe tṛtīya vat

original: ādyavattu parāvṛtte vijñāne nirdiśed budhaḥ // Abhidh-d_343 //
analyzed: ādya vat tu parāvṛtte vijñāne nirdiśet budhaḥ
bhāvanāpatha hātavyaḥ nikāyaḥ sarvagaiḥ saha

nikāyāḥ kāma rūpa āptāḥ cakṣuḥ indriya gocare
duḥkha hetu dṛś abhyāsa prahātavyāḥ trayaḥ trayaḥ
ārūpyāḥ bhāvanā heyāḥ sarvagāḥ ca anuśerate
parivṛtte tu catvāraḥ samadṛś kṣaya varjitāḥ

original: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
analyzed: duḥkha indriye tu kāma āptaḥ svaiḥ eva saha sarvagaiḥ

original: tadgocare tu vijñāne nikāyā anuśerate // Abhidh-d_347 //
analyzed: tad gocare tu vijñāne nikāyāḥ anuśerate
kāma āpannāḥ trayaḥ rūpāḥ sarvaga abhyāsa saṃkṣayāḥ

original: paravṛtte tu catvāraḥ kāmāptā anuśerate // Abhidh-d_348 //
analyzed: paravṛtte tu catvāraḥ kāma āptāḥ anuśerate

sakalāḥ dviṣparāvṛtteḥ catvāraḥ ca anuśerate

tri dhātu saṃgṛhītāḥ tu sakalāḥ mana aindriye

saṃskṛta ālambanāḥ eva parivṛtte nuśerate

original: viśeṣo dviḥparāvṛttau vidyate 'tra na kaścana // Abhidh-d_352 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ dvis parāvṛttau vidyate na kaścana
duḥkham darśana heya ādeḥ cittāt cittāni kāminaḥ

original: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā // Abhidh-d_353 //
analyzed: bhavati anantaram ṣaṣ vā tasya ūrddhvam pañca pañca vā
rūpa dhātu upapannasya cittāni tu vinirdiśet

original: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa // Abhidh-d_354 //
analyzed: ekam vā pañca vā ṣaṣ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa
ārūpya dhātu jātasya cittāni imāni lakṣayet
svadhātukāni pañca eva cyuti kāle daśāni atas
sācivyāt anuśāyi tvāt cittam sa anuśayam matam
dvidhā vā kliṣṭam akliṣṭam ekadhā eva apadiśyate
mohāt sat kāya dṛś tasyāḥ anta grāha īkṣaṇam tatas
kāṅkṣā mithyā īkṣaṇam tasyāḥ śīla āmarśaḥ tatas dṛśaḥ
rāgaḥ sva dṛśi dveṣaḥ nyatra
jñeyaḥ pravṛtti bāhulyāt evam eṣām anukramaḥ
sat asat mitra yogāt tu tad vṛtti aniyamaḥ mataḥ
kleśaḥ utpadyate kaścid saṃpūrṇaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ tribhiḥ

original: vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
analyzed: sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāma āsravaḥ mataḥ
styāna auddhatye ca hitvā ūrdhvam samāna tvāt bhava astravaḥ
avidyā ākhyaḥ tu mūla tvāt avidyā sārvadhātukī
tathā ogha yogāḥ dṛś varjjam tad pṛthaktvam tu pāṭavāt

original: sāvidyā dve upādāne yathāktau dve tu dṛṅmaye /
analyzed: sā avidyā dve upādāne yathā aktau dve tu dṛś maye
catasraḥ pi ekam antya ekam kumārga ādi samāśrayāt
śeṣāḥ traidhātukāḥ tu antye sa ātma bhāva pravṛttitaḥ
saṃyojana ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ darśitāḥ pañcadhā punar
nava saṃyojanāni asmin īrṣyā mātsaryam eva ca
dravya āmarṣaṇa sāmānyāt dṛśaḥ saṃyojana dvayam

original: ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣākāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
analyzed: ādi antye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣā kāma chandaḥ dvis eva yaḥ
dvābhyām kāma anatikrāntiḥ punar ānayanam tribhiḥ
sarva dṛś heya bhāktve trayam etat udāhṛtam
sarva anartha nidāna tvāt mārga pratyarthi bhāvataḥ
tathya ūhā vidhura tvāt ca tri saṃyojana deśanā
dvau rūpa arūpa jau rāgau māna moha uddhavāḥ trayaḥ
tri vedanā anuśāyi tvāt dṛḍha tvāt bandhana trayam
dvi pakṣa granthanāt granthāḥ catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
abhidhyā ākhyāḥ tathā dveṣaḥ parāmarśa dvayam tathā
upakleśāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ saṃrambha ādyāḥ yathā uditāḥ

original: sarve vā caitasāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃjñitāḥ // Abhidh-d_371 //
analyzed: sarve vā caitasāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskāra skandha saṃjñitāḥ
mūlakleśa malāḥ tu anye ṣaṣ upakleśa saṃjñitāḥ
śāṭhya upanāha pradāśa māyā mada viheṭhanāḥ
mrarkṣya īrṣyā hrī anapatrāpya styānam iddha uddhava krudhaḥ

original: mātsaryaṃ kukṛtatvaṃ ca daśadhā paryavasthitiḥ // Abhidh-d_373 //
analyzed: mātsaryam kukṛta tvam ca daśadhā paryavasthitiḥ
ebhyaḥ nu naya nisyandāḥ āhrīkya auddhata ta ādayaḥ
mrakṣa anapatrapāḥ tyānamiddha ādyāḥ moha saṃbhavāḥ
kaukṛtyam vicikitsā uttham krodha ādyāḥ dveṣa sambhavāḥ
māyā śāṭhya vijṛmbhikāḥ
kāya duṣṭhūla tā ādyāḥ ca jñeyāḥ vyāmiśra sambhavāḥ
saumanasyena rāgasya saṃprayogaḥ sukhena ca

original: dveṣasya daurmanasyena duḥkhena ca nigadyate // Abhidh-d_377 //
analyzed: dveṣasya daurmanasyena duḥkhena ca nigadyate
sarvaiḥ mohasya vittibhyām caitasībhyām asat dṛśaḥ

original: kāṅkṣā ca daurmanasyena śeṣāṇāṃ sumanastayā // Abhidh-d_378 //
analyzed: kāṅkṣā ca daurmanasyena śeṣāṇām sumanaḥ tayā
upekṣayā tu sarveṣām kāma āptānām ayam vidhiḥ
itas nya dhātu jānām tu prati bhūmi antaram svakaiḥ
īrṣyayā daurmanasyena kaukṛtyasya tathā krudhaḥ
pradaṣṭeḥ ca upanaddheḥ ca vihiṃsāyāḥ tathā eva ca
mātsaryam daurmanasyena saumanasyena kasyacid

original: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca // Abhidh-d_381 //
analyzed: dvābhyām māyā tathā śāṭhyam mrakṣaḥ middham tathā eva ca
madaḥ tu sumanaḥ skandha sukhābhyām saṃprayujyate

āhrīkyam anapatrāpyam styānam iddham tathā uddhavaḥ
samasta ālambinā antyena tān vetti adhruva tā ādibhiḥ
kleśa atyanta kṣayaḥ ntyena saṃbhinna ālambanena vā
viṣayam trayam etat dvidhā iṣyate
tasya evam paśyataḥ sākṣāt udaya vyaya darśanam
skandheṣu jāyate paścāt cakra bhramarikā ādi vat
sa pratītyasamutpādam skandhānām pratyavekṣate
satyeṣu tadā kaścid parīkṣate
tad anitya tva duḥkha tve samavetya tatas punar
akartṛkān nirīhān ca pratyaya adhīna saṃbhavān
dṛṣṭvā sarveṣu anātmā iti tattva ākāram niṣevate
an adhiṣṭhātṛka tvam ca pāratantryam ca paśyataḥ

original: sarvadharmeṣu nairātmye sthirā buddhiḥ pravartate // Abhidh-d_389 //
analyzed: sarva dharmeṣu nairātmye sthirā buddhiḥ pravartate

original: taduktyā ca taduktatvācchūnyākāro na deśitaḥ // Abhidh-d_390 //
analyzed: tad uktyā ca tad ukta tvāt śūnya ākāraḥ na deśitaḥ
gotra dvāra samūha ādīn dhātu ādīnām yathāyatham
sva sādhāraṇa cihnābhyām sadatā upaparīkṣate

nirmathnataḥ krameṇa asya duḥkha satya bhava araṇim

ākāra patitam jñānam tatas śama niyāmakam
bhāvanā mayam ūṣma ākhyam jāyate sa anuvartakam
tatas tathā eva mūrdhānaḥ mithyādṛṣṭi upaghātinaḥ
ūṣmabhyaḥ dhika sāmarthyāt ratna śraddhā vivardhinaḥ
na itu asmin ubhayatra api paścimā
bhāvyate skandha dṛś tva ādau na tat nirvāṇa darśinaḥ

mokṣe ntye saṃmukhībhūtāḥ samagrāḥ khalu anāgatāḥ
ākārāḥ khalu sarve api bhāvyante gotra lābhataḥ

sarvatra a kiraṇe mūrdhnaḥ nirodha a kiraṇa edhane
dharma ākhyāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ catasraḥ khalu anāgatāḥ
ākārāḥ sakalāḥ tatra bhāvyante gotra lābhataḥ

anāgatāḥ catasraḥ tu bhāvyante tatra niścayāt

original: ākārāḥ sakalā jñeyāḥ kṣāntivinyasane śṛṇu // Abhidh-d_403 //
analyzed: ākārāḥ sakalāḥ jñeyāḥ kṣānti vinyasane śṛṇu

original: śrutacintāmayaṃ hitvā sūkṣmasūkṣmaṃ vyapohya ca // Abhidh-d_408 //
analyzed: śruta cintā mayam hitvā sūkṣma sūkṣmam vyapohya ca

bhūtām anyatarām tābhyaḥ catasraḥ khalu anāgatāḥ

antye dhyāne prayoga ādi mārgeṣu aṣṭāsu pūrvavat

divyākṣiśrutyabhijñāyām vimokṣa ādau tathā eva ca
prathamām saṃmukhībhūtām catasraḥ khalu anāgatāḥ

original: saṃmukhe nāma jātāstu tisra eva vinirdiśet // Abhidh-d_414 //

original: āryasya khalu vairāgyaprayoge kṣepaṇe pi ca /
analyzed: āryasya khalu vairāgya prayoge kṣepaṇe ca

original: ṛdhyādau tu guṇāḥ sarvamanāryasyaiva nirdiśet // Abhidh-d_417 //
analyzed: ṛdhi ādau tu guṇāḥ sarvam anāryasya eva nirdiśet
antya pūrva nivāsa ādau ca dharma pratisaṃvidi

ārūpya ākhya vimokṣa ādau saṃjñā sūkṣma udaye tathā
sarvābhyaḥ nyatara abhūtāḥ catasraḥ khalu anāgatāḥ
brūyāt tu sūkṣma sūkṣme ntyām bhūtām tisraḥ tu anāgatāḥ

dharma jñāna ruciḥ duḥkhe nirmalam dharma darśanam
tatas tatra eva avadhṛtiḥ dharma jñānam anantaram
evam triṣu api satyeṣu tathā evā anvaya dhīḥ dvidhā
anantyāḥ tatra dṛś mārgāḥ jñeyāḥ pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ

original: punastridhā tridhā kṛtvā trīnato rūpagā nava /
analyzed: punar tridhā tridhā kṛtvā trīn atas rūpa gāḥ nava

original: udbhavārthaṃ sukhārthaṃ ca kleśāśaṅkārthameva ca // Abhidh-d_430 //

original: na jātu dṛṣṭapūrvāstāḥ sarvairapi pṛthagjanaiḥ // Abhidh-d_431 //

original: tatphalārthaṃ kṣayajñānaṃ tadekālambanaṃ na vā // Abhidh-d_433 //
analyzed: tad phala artham kṣaya jñānam tad eka ālambanam na vā

aśaikṣa ākhyaḥ api boddhavyaḥ nityam eva amalīmasaḥ

śaikṣasya tribhiḥ akṣa ādyaiḥ dvābhyām

tīkṣṇa indriyasya mauleṣu dhyāneṣu pratipad sukhā
kṣipra abhijñā alpa buddheḥ tu viparyayāt

original: daśa caikaśca tatpakṣyāḥ saptatriṃśattu nāmataḥ // Abhidh-d_441 //

balāni atrā indriyāṇi eva prajñā eva smṛti upasthitiḥ

doṣa hāṇam anutpādam guṇa utpādam vivardhanam
sakṛt karoti yat tat hi sa prahāṇa catuṣṭayam
chanda vyāyāma mīmāṃsā citta ākṛṣṭāḥ samādhayaḥ
ṛddhipādāḥ tu catvāraḥ guṇa sampatti yonayaḥ
proktam bodhi traya īśi tvāt śraddhā ādi indriya pañcakam
kathitam bala śabdena tat eva anabhibhūtitaḥ
bodhana arthena nirdiṣṭam śāstrā bodhyaṅga saptakam
pratītyā paramārthena prajñā ityantam anugrahāt
prīti prasrabdhi upekṣāṇām uktāt hetoḥ tad aṅga tā
saṃkalpa ādeḥ catuṣkasya pathaḥ jñeya ānukūlyataḥ
prādhānyam saptavargasya prārambha ūṣma gata ādiṣu
yathākramam viboddhavyam bhāvanā dṛṣṭi mārgayoḥ
na cittam rāja kalpa tvāt guṇa doṣa anuvartanāt
vyavahāra ānukūlya tvāt saṃjñā hi eteṣu na iṣyate
vipāka phala nimna tvāt mārga ukteḥ ca na cetanā
na a prādhānyāt manaskāraḥ vidyā avidyā pravartanāt
kriyā ārambha pradhāna tvāt na chandaḥ vīrya bṛṃhaṇāt
na adhimokṣaḥ samāropāt na sparśaḥ daurvibhāvyataḥ
a viśārada vṛttitaḥ
na apramādaḥ para aṅga tvāt na avihiṃsā viheṭhanāt
sattva adhiṣṭhāna vṛtti tvāt na maitrī karuṇā ādayaḥ
mārga aṅga akṣa eka deśa tvāt na api avetya prasattayaḥ
na a dveṣaḥ śubha mūlebhyaḥ sattva gocara bhāvataḥ
audāsīnyāt na nirvāṇam daviṣṭhyāt na para dhvaniḥ
bodhi aṅgāni arajaskāni bodheḥ nediṣṭa bhāvataḥ
tad anyāni avabodhyāni sa malāni amalāni api
ādye dhyāne khilāḥ maule na agamye prīti apākṛtāḥ
dvitīye pi apasaṃkalpāḥ dvayoḥ ca asmāt dvayāt ṛte
śīla aṅgebhyaḥ ca tābhyām ca draṣṭavyā triṣu arūpiṣu
bodhyaṅgebhyaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ kāme bodhyaṅga varjitāḥ
yaḥ tad prathamatas proktāḥ catasraḥ tatra kovidaiḥ
aṣṭānām nīrajaskānām mārga aṅgānām yathāyatham

tri satya adhigame lābhaḥ śīla dharma prasādayoḥ
mārga satya īkṣaṇe buddha saṅgha gocarayoḥ api

original: buddho yastadguṇe śraddhā prasādaḥ sa jine mataḥ // Abhidh-d_464 //

original: pūrvoktaiva hi yā bodhiḥ sā samyagjñānamucyate /

original: ākhyātā dhātavaḥ sūtre tridhā bhedo hyapekṣayā // Abhidh-d_470 //

lokaḥ yam tattva saṃmugdhaḥ jñeya tattve pramuhyati

original: mārgākhye tvanvayajñāne ṣaḍ bhāvyante 'tha sapta vā /

kleśa sva uparima sthāna nīrajaska anuvarti vā

original: dve trīṇi trīṇi ca dve vā hānapakṣyādyanantaram // Abhidh-d_565 //
analyzed: dve trīṇi trīṇi ca dve vā hāna pakṣi ādi anantaram
vyutkrāntaka samāpattiḥ arhataḥ kopya dharmaṇaḥ
tad prayogaḥ dvidhā bhūmiḥ gatvā agamya jigīṣayā
dharmabhūmi utkrameṇa aṣṭau śuddhaka ākhyāt anāsravam

original: śuddhakācca tṛtīyaṃ svaṃ niṣṭhā śuddhācca nirmalam // Abhidh-d_567 //
analyzed: śuddhakāt ca tṛtīyam svam niṣṭhā śuddhāt ca nirmalam
sva ūrdhvāḥ eva upajanyante dhyāna ārūpya bhavaḥ śubhāḥ
bhava agra sthaḥ tu agati ādau nirmalām avalambate
bāla ādi adhyāna saṃprāptau laukikasya eva bhāvanā
ūṣma ādi varjye ca alabdhe dhyāna antara samudbhave
vīta rāgasya ca alabdhe pūrva sāmantake tathā

original: viraktasya tu pūrvasya nirmalasyaiva bhāvanā // Abhidh-d_570 //
analyzed: viraktasya tu pūrvasya nirmalasya eva bhāvanā
nyāma mārga anvaya jñāne śaikṣasya akṣa vivardhane
ānantarya āhvaye mārge dṛś mārge dvādaśa kṣaṇāḥ
bhava agrasya ca vairāgye kṣaya jñāna vivarjite
ākopyā
āryasya kāma vairāgye carame mukti vartmani
jñāna traye traya ākhye ca nyāme na agamya varjite
śaikṣasya rāgiṇaḥ pūrva tri bhūmi indriya vardhane
prayoga mukti mārgeṣu kāma ādi adhyāna jasya ca
dvividha arha tva saṃprāptau mukti vartmani paścime
viraktānām ca śaikṣāṇām avyagra anya tribhū jaye
bhāvanāḥ dvividhasya api na ubhayasya tu bhāvanām
anāgamya āśraye nyāma tad bhāgīya udbhava ādiṣu
dvitīya ādiṣu anena eva vidhinā abhyuhya yuktitaḥ
abhidharma naya jñāne jñeya anāgata bhāvanā
sa āsvādaḥ sva bhava ālambaḥ śubham dhyānam samanta dṛś
ārupyāḥ kuśalāḥ maulāḥ na adhas loka avalambinaḥ
dhyāna ārūpyaiḥ prahīyante nirmalaiḥ mānasaḥ malāḥ
adhas bhūmeḥ tu labhyante sāmantaiḥ api śuddhakaiḥ
sa vitarka vicāra ādyāḥ trayaḥ proktāḥ samādhayaḥ

original: dhyānāntare sa cārodhaḥ sadvayo 'nyatra nirdvayaḥ // Abhidh-d_580 //
analyzed: dhyāna antare sa ca ārodhaḥ sa dvayaḥ nyatra nirdvayaḥ
sa āsrava anāsravaḥ ca anye ekādaśa bhuvaḥ trayaḥ
ārya ākāra mati dyotāḥ śūnyatā ādyaḥ samādhayaḥ
daśa apraṇihita ākārāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ dvayam matam
animittaḥ mṛta ākāraiḥ caturbhiḥ saṃpravartate
vimukteḥ dvi prakārāyāḥ prāptaye nirmalāḥ punar
vimokṣa sumu
kha śabdena te eva āviṣkṛtāḥ trayaḥ
dvayam ālambate śaikṣam śūnyatas nityatas tathā
kṣayam apratisaṃkhyā ākhyam antyaḥ gṛhṇāti śāntataḥ
ekādaśa bhuvaḥ sarve sa āsravāḥ nṛṣu akopinaḥ
samādhi bhāvanā dhyānam sukhāya prathamam śubham
darśanāya akṣi abhijñā uktā prajñā bhedāya yātnikāḥ
yaḥ ntyaḥ vajra upame dhyāne sarva kleśa kṣayāya sā
sūtram ca etat samākhyātam buddhena ātma upanāyikam
caturṇām apramāṇānām maitrī a dveṣaḥ tathā kṛpā
muditā prītiḥ ekeṣām upekṣā lobhaḥ iṣyate
vyāpādasya vihiṃsāyāḥ arateḥ tṛṣ dviṣaḥ tathā
pratipakṣaḥ yama ākhyātaḥ damana artham sva cetasaḥ
sukha ādhāne sukhā maitrī duḥkha nāśa unmukhī kṛpā

original: muditā modanānimnā sattvā ebhyeva paścimā // Abhidh-d_590 //
analyzed: muditāḥ sattvāḥ ebhyaḥ eva paścimā
draṣṭavyā vṛttiḥ eteṣām ākāraiḥ sukhita ādi bhiḥ
ebhyaḥ tu anyatamena api brahma sāyujyam aśnute
nṛṣu kāma avalambīni dhyānayoḥ muditā āhvayoḥ
ṣaḍ bhaumāni tad anyāni kecid icchanti saptasu
vimokṣāḥ kathitāḥ aṣṭau teṣām dvau aśubha ātmakau
tāvādya dhyānayoḥ antye tṛtīyaḥ lobha lakṣaṇaḥ
catvāraḥ vimokṣa ākhyā samāhitāḥ
nirodha ākhya samāpattiḥ vimokṣaḥ
tasyāḥ tu saṃmukhībhāvaḥ sūkṣma sūkṣmāt anantaram

original: vyutthānacittamapyasyāḥ svaṃ śuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ tvadhaḥ // Abhidh-d_595 //
analyzed: vyutthāna cittam api asyāḥ svam śuddham nirmalam tu adhas
kāmāvacara dṛśya arthāḥ vimokṣāḥ prathamāḥ trayaḥ
anye tu anvaya dhī pakṣa sva ūrdhva duḥkha ādi avekṣiṇāḥ
sūtre bhi bhava saṃjñā ākhyam proktam āyatana aṣṭakam
vimokṣa adhika vṛtti etat citta aiśvarya pradarśakam
